Package databases

Class DbOperations

java.lang.Object
databases.DbOperations
public class DbOperations
extends java.lang.Object
Class that contains all CRUD operations and complex method of Neo4J and MongoDB together. Here is were the two databases works together

    • show10Wine

      private void show10Wine​(java.util.ArrayList<Wine> wines, int times, int perTimes)
      Method build only for visualization problem on CLI, because could be thousands of wines on social. With this method could be only visualized 10 wines each time and user could decide each time to visualize other 10 wines or stop the visualization and start to do some operations
      Parameters:
      wines - : Wine's list
      times -
      perTimes -
